text: aqsm allah taealaa bahmrar al'ufuq eind alghrwb, wabiallayl wama jame min aldawabi walhshrat walhwam waghayr dhlk, wbalqmr 'iidha takamul nwrh, ltrkbunn- 'ayuha alnas- 'atwarana mutaeadidat wahwala mtbaynt: min alnutfat 'iilaa alealaqat 'iilaa almudghat 'iilaa nufikh alruwh 'iilaa almawt 'iilaa albaeth walnshwr. wala yajuz llmkhlwq 'an yuqsim bighayr allh, walaw faeal dhlk lashrk
